environment: temperate or warm deserts or forests
feats: Improved Critical (bite), Improved Initiative, Iron Will, Power Attack, Skill Focus (Perception), Skill Focus (Stealth), Weapon Focus (bite)
senses: darkvision 60 ft., low-light vision, scent; Perception +17
description: This giant armored snake has large fangs, dripping with venom that hisses when it spatters on the ground.

sections.body: A metal, wooden, or natural weapon that deals piercing or slashing damage to a seps takes 4d6 points of acid damage unless the weapon's wielder succeeds at a DC 22 Reflex save at the listed DC. The DC is Constitution-based.
sections.name: Acid Blood

sections.body: Any creature killed by seps poison dissolves into an acidic liquid that deals 2d6 points of acid damage per round to anything in its square (including the dead creature's equipment).
sections.name: Liquefaction

sections.body: Bite—injury; save Fort DC 22; frequency 1/round for 10 rounds; effect 1d8 acid damage and 1d4 Con drain; cure 2 consecutive saves.
sections.name: Poison

sections.body: A seps is an exotic snake-like creature whose powerful jaws contain acidic venom so potent that it quickly dissolves prey into liquid.
An adult seps is 30 feet long and weighs 1,500 pounds.

name: Seps
